febrile adjective
(ACTIVE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
literary extremely active, or too excited, imaginative, or emotional: She sang with febrile intensity.febrile imagination He has a febrile imagination. Synonym
fevered

febrile adjective
(FEVER)
medical
  specialized caused by a fever: febrile convulsion High fevers in babies can cause febrile convulsions with very serious consequences. Compare
afebrile Related word
fever
